org.mokai.persist.impl
Class DefaultMessageStore

java.lang.Object
  org.mokai.persist.impl.DefaultMessageStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageStore
public class DefaultMessageStore
extends Object
implements MessageStore

Default implementation of a MessageStore that does nothing and always returns and empty collection of Messages

Author:
German Escobar

 Collection<Message> list(MessageCriteria criteria)
          Retrieves the messages that matches the criteria.
 void saveOrUpdate(Message message)
          If the message is not persisted, it saves the messages, otherwise it updates the record.

          Updates the status of all the messages that matches the criteria with the newStatus argument.
